content: I do not have personal opinions or beliefs. however, historians have debated the effectiveness and benefit of the great wall of china throughout history. while it acted as a physical barrier against invaders, it was not impenetrable, and some sections of the wall were breached or avoided by invaders. the cost of building and maintaining the wall may have also put a heavy burden on the country's resources and the lives of its citizens. despite this, the great wall of china has become an iconic symbol of chinese history and culture, and remains a popular attraction for tourists.
